author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two individuals have approached the Madras High Court Bench here seeking a direction to Madurai city police to refrain from harassing them in connection with the enquiry into hurling of a bottle filled with kerosene into the office of Cooperation Minister ‘Sellur’ K. Raju at Sammattipuram here on January 9.

The petitioners T. Ramkumar (25) and G. Thirukumaran (23), drivers, claimed that the S.S. Colony police had been summoning them frequently in connection with the case though they had no connection whatsoever with the crime.
title: Plea to refrain from harassing
